title: What is the significance of the study of modern technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology is the property of humanity, and if it not being studied, it will be lost forever or quite sometime. The reason I say this is because it happened before, and if we don’t change, it will happen again. For example, have you heard of any of these? -Greek Fire formula -Orbital sun gun -V3 super gun If you have heard of any of these, then you contradict to what I said. If you never did, then you just proved my point. Even more so that when most of the people that I asked if they heard of any of these, they never knew. Such things as these will remain lost in history from us, until we uncover their very own existence. Also, humanity has been using this to improve itself. And if one day most of it gets wiped out, we would be back onto the stone age.
